MapBiomas Indonesia menyampaikan bahwa l: MapBiomas Indonesia conveyed that the land cover dynamics shown in Collection 3.0 will strengthen data and maps of land cover classes relevant to the Peatland and Mangrove Restoration Agency (BRGM).
Berupa data dan peta area terbakar di In: FIRE 1.0 presents data and maps of burned areas in Indonesia throughout 2013–2023, supplemented with analyses by each land cover class found in MapBiomas Indonesia’s Collection 2.0.
Mapbiomas Alerta: Pelatihan validasi ale: MapBiomas Alerta: Deforestation alert validation training
MapBiomas Indonesia melatih 10 calon val: MapBiomas Indonesia trained 10 prospective validators projected to validate every deforestation alert in Indonesia in 2024.
Menampilkan dinamika tutupan lahan Indon: Displaying land cover dynamics in Indonesia, this platform provides land cover maps, statistics and transitions, as well as overlays with land uses and concessions.
Menyajikan data dan peta area terbakar d: FIRE presents data and maps of burned areas in Indonesia by optimizing the Google Earth Engine and a deep learning approach to publicly available satellite imagery.
Setiap alert deforestasi diverifikasi, l: Every deforestation alert is verified, then validated through the latest high-resolution satellite imagery, to present authentic deforestation data and maps.
Mengingat pentingnya kualitas data dan p: Bearing in mind the importance of quality in the data and maps it produces, MapBiomas Indonesia deemed it necessary to have a Scientific Advisory Committee (SAC) with the role of providing input to MapBiomas Indonesia to ensure its continual alignment with scientific principles and/or methods.
Oleh karena itu, pada 2023–sebelum rilis: Accordingly, in 2023 – prior to the release of Collection 2 – MapBiomas Indonesia established a Scientific Advisory Committee made up of experts and relevant practitioners. The committee’s membership was chosen by considering (i) geographical representation; (ii) mutually reinforcing scientific expertise; (iii) gender balance; and (iv) multistakeholder representation, for a duration of two years.
Anggota Komite Penasihat Akademik MapBio: Members of the MapBiomas Indonesia Scientific Advisory Committee for 2023–2025 are as follows:
Guru besar penginderaan jauh Fakultas Ge: Professor of remote sensing from Gadjah Mada University’s Faculty of Geography is active in conducting research and publishing academic papers on land cover mapping in Indonesia. He can be contacted via email at projo.danoedoro@geo.ugm.ac.id or pdanoedoro@ugm.ac.id.
Dosen Jurusan Kehutanan Fakultas Pertani: Lecturer in forestry from the University of Lampung’s Faculty of Agriculture earned his doctorate from the University of Tokyo. He can be contacted via email at arief.darmawan@gmail.com.
Pejabat struktural di BAPPENAS/Kementeri: Official with BAPPENAS/Ministry of National Development Planning earned her doctorate from the University of Queensland. She can be contacted via email at nur.hrahayu@bappenas.go.id.
Ahli sistem informasi geospasial ini mer: Geospatial information systems expert and lecturer with the Tadulako University Faculty of Forestry. She can be contacted via email at hasrianimuis@gmail.com.
Dosen Fakultas Kehutanan Universitas Pap: Lecturer from the Papua University Faculty of Forestry earned a master’s degree from the Australian National University. She can be contacted via email at f.kesaulija@unipa.ac.id.
